page.title: 10Cheshunt 20 years ago
page.content: Most families had 4 or 5 members and both parents worked.Most owned their homes.Houses had 3 bedrooms,an inside toilet,kitchen,and a garden.Some people lived in flats.Home heating was gas,electric,or coal fired central heating.Clothes were similar to todays. Prices were cheaper,a pound of potatoes 3p,tea 7p a quarter.Shops were around the Old Pond area,and in Waltham Cross.Shops shut at lunch time.Shops were less hygenic.Bread,milk and eggs were delivered to the home.Schooling was very similar to today,but jobs were easier to get.Transport was cheaper.A gallon of petrol was 11p,and local roads were busy with cars,buses and lorries.Most people owned a car.Diesel trains went to Liverpool Street Station.Train and bus services were reliable.
